name: PAT_ENC_EXT_HOSP
description: This table contains information on external hospital admission encounters. The information includes the admission and discharge dates along with the admitting hospital.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EXT_HOSP_NAME
columns.description: Holds name of external hospital where patient was admitted.

columns.name: HOSP_ADMIT_DATE
columns.description: Date the patient was admitted to the external hospital.

columns.name: HOSP_DISCHRG_DATE
columns.description: Date the patient was discharged from the hospital.

columns.name: CONTACT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The encounter type category number for the encounter.
entries: Home Health Resumption of Care Planning
Resolute Professional Billing Hospital Prof Fee
